prodNameC: 邦迪斯人類抗乙型醣蛋白免疫球蛋白G免疫分析套組
prodNameE: THE BINDING SITE BINDAZYME Human Anti B2GP1 IgG Enzyme Immunoassay Kit
ingredientsDesc:
• Instruction Leaflet: Giving full assay details.
• QC Certificate: Indicating the expected performance of the batch
• β2GP1 Coated Wells: 12 breakapart 8 well strips coated with human β2GP1 antigen. The plate is packaged in a re-sealable foil bag containing two desiccant pouches.
• Type II Sample Diluent: 2 bottles containing 50 mL of buffer for sample dilution. Coloured yellow, ready to use.
• Wash Buffer (20x Concentrate): 1 bottle containing 50 mL of a 20-fold concentrated buffer for washing the wells.
• β2GP1 IgG Calibrators: 5 bottles each containing 1.2 mL of diluted human serum, with the following concentrations of anti- β2GP1 autoantibody: 300, 100, 33.3, 11.1, 3.7 U/mL. Ready to use.
• β2GP1 IgG Positive Control: 1 bottle containing 1.2 mL of diluted human serum. The expected value is given on the QC certificate. Ready to use.
• β2GP1 Negative Control: 1 bottle containing 1.2 mL of diluted human serum. The expected value is given on the QC certificate.
applicantName: 太暘生物科技股份有限公司
applicantAddr: 新北市汐止區康寧街169巷25號13樓
efficacy: 用於測量人體血清中抗B2GP1的IgG抗體。

mdKind.mdKindMCodeName: C 免疫學及微生物學裝置
mdKind.mdKindDCodeName: C.5560 乳酸去氫免疫試驗系統
